title: Redemption
description: ‘Cause you are my invisible stringsYou’re the ties that bind me wholeYou’re all that keeps me togetherYou’re the dark matter of my soulIt’s been six long months since Gabriel left and Noelle’s nightmares are swallowing her whole. In a last ditch attempt to save her sanity, Jax takes her to Cal Henway, the infamous and enigmatic Master of Kink, to see if he can slay her demons. He, in turn, entrusts her care to Master Blue – Dom, loveable rogue and practical joker. Blue knows the only way to silence her demons is to sate them, but will his journey through the darkest parts of her desires save her, or break her beyond all repair?
author: Ivory Quinn
